name: Jewel Xmax Line3
description:
Jewel Xmax Line3 adds several creative innovations to the already very popular match game concept with four differently themed game modes and unlimited levels of challenging fun.Awesome puzzle game with exiting new features and addictive gameplay in christmas flavour with cool graphics and animations.
HOW TO PLAY :

1. Standardize the jewels with the same, create 3 matches to become the same ball 3 line.
2. Fill a predetermined target, to win the levels.
3. Find the tools that can help you to win the levels faster.
